channel.title: Jumping while on moving objects
channel.description: When you jump while moving, "inbound tram" or "on a rail" you jump backwards. Is this a limitation of the sdk or a bug?

item.title: Jumping while on moving objects
item.dc:creator: Savion
item.description:
I only noticed it when the first rail cart slams into another one. In the original I thought it launched you all the way across the room when you jump during the impact.

Could be remembering it wrong.

item.title: Jumping while on moving objects
item.dc:creator: Picklesworth
item.description:
If I recall correctly, jumping was like that in the original Half-Life, so it was probably done on purpose. I would be very interested to know for sure, though

I don’t mind it as an odd bit of nostalgia, but I have noticed it causing problems when moving vertically. I could be imagining this, but I think I remember jumping and falling through a lift at one point. Also, can anyone confirm if the same jumping behaviour applies to headcrabs?
